UniprotID	Q9NPJ4
Accession	Q9NPJ4;B4DU72
EntryName	PNRC2_HUMAN
ProteinName	Proline-rich nuclear receptor coactivator 2
GeneName	PNRC2 HSPC208
Length	139
Function	Involved in nonsense-mediated mRNA decay (NMD) by acting as a bridge between the mRNA decapping complex and the NMD machinery (PubMed:19150429). May act by targeting the NMD machinery to the P-body and recruiting the decapping machinery to aberrant mRNAs (PubMed:19150429). Required for UPF1/RENT1 localization to the P-body (PubMed:19150429). Plays a role in glucocorticoid receptor-mediated mRNA degradation by interacting with the glucocorticoid receptor NR3C1 in a ligand-dependent manner when it is bound to the 5' UTR of target mRNAs and recruiting the RNA helicase UPF1 and the mRNA-decapping enzyme DCP1A, leading to RNA decay (PubMed:25775514). Also acts as a nuclear receptor coactivator (PubMed:11574675). May play a role in controlling the energy balance between energy storage and energy expenditure (By similarity).
Subcellular Location	Nucleus; Cytoplasm; P-body
Disorder	0.6482,0.7289,0.7718,0.7755,0.8013,0.8235,0.7672,0.7718,0.7881,0.8050,0.8235,0.8623,0.8741,0.8235,0.8343,0.8462,0.8421,0.9081,0.9013,0.9381,0.9269,0.9415,0.9362,0.9269,0.9346,0.9126,0.9081,0.8966,0.8596,0.8681,0.8596,0.8530,0.8421,0.8313,0.8872,0.8792,0.8828,0.8741,0.7881,0.7982,0.7881,0.7799,0.7459,0.7080,0.6906,0.5533,0.5992,0.5707,0.6227,0.7036,0.7036,0.6991,0.6991,0.6991,0.7080,0.6991,0.7120,0.5758,0.6089,0.7369,0.7369,0.7547,0.7547,0.6620,0.7036,0.7209,0.8198,0.7415,0.7595,0.7881,0.8050,0.8013,0.7331,0.6576,0.5419,0.5342,0.5254,0.5176,0.6043,0.5854,0.5807,0.5807,0.4766,0.4619,0.5620,0.5254,0.5382,0.4507,0.5098,0.5139,0.5419,0.5419,0.5254,0.6269,0.6991,0.7331,0.6531,0.6906,0.6851,0.7415,0.7547,0.7369,0.7459,0.7369,0.6948,0.7209,0.6755,0.6620,0.6576,0.6806,0.7120,0.6712,0.6531,0.6661,0.6375,0.5493,0.5854,0.6661,0.5139,0.5211,0.4256,0.4051,0.4119,0.3286,0.3529,0.4087,0.3286,0.3948,0.3460,0.4119,0.3740,0.3215,0.2988,0.2503,0.2064,0.1643,0.2129,0.2064,0.1583
